name: Bored Ai - Game jam edition
description:
Bored AI

Accessibility Info: This game can be played using the mouse only

You are a War-AI that controls a turret and a drone. The last battle long since forgotten, you get bored and start shooting the flies around you.

The Twist: your bullets can hit you, and if they do, you die! Try shooting as many flies as you can, and make the shots bounce away from you with your drone.

——————————————Controls—————————————————————

Aim: Move your mouse
Shoot: Right Mouse Button
Move your Drone: Left Mouse button, then move your mouse and release (Drag and Drop)
————————————————————————————————————————


Credit where Credit is due:

-Healthbar from the megaman series, tho only 3 lives as you have been damaged from the last battle
-Turret and grass inspired by Jackal NES
-Music: Jonathan So
-Sounds: https://gamesupply.itch.io/1000-nintendo-sound-effects

Made In Construct 3 for: https://itch.io/jam/not-my-nes-jam during the time limit
